channel.title: 7roject - 718/728 BETA | Need players | Classes | Fun | Webclient
channel.description:
7roject (Project 7) is currently in beta and we need players!
[center][url=http://www.7roject.enjin.com/play/]Webclient[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?9bzjfj29tj0qqy0/]Download 3mb[/url] [url=http://www.7roject.enjin.com/]Forums[/url][/center]
[center] :Features:
Fight Pits 100% Clan Wars 100% Jad 100% Barrows 100% Castle Wars 99% (need to add shop for prizes) Dominion Tower 100% Kiln 100% Corp 100% God Wars 100% Tormented Demons 100% With working shields Nex (Attack switching 90%) Queen Black Dragon 100% KBD 100% Quick Prayers Class System - Higher classes have better perks Xp Trackers In-Game Highscores In-Game Pk Highscores All Runescape Items as of 09/01/12 50/50 Gambling Toggle for 317 Choice of starter - Higher the class better the starter Money Pouch Cash stack overflow system Runespan SOF (squeal of fortune) ~Many more~
Excuse the big pictures
Choosing Class and Starter: [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/25q3kf4.png[/img]
Home: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2jg9j5x.png[/img]
Home East: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2v802g1.png[/img]
Spirit Tree via Home: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2zzj3a9.png[/img]
Gambling for King+ Class with 3+ Hours: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/wsnriq.png[/img]
Gambling Winning: [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34o55rc.png[/img]
Crystal Key Chest: [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/wbtjqr.png[/img]
Trimming Black-Rune (advanced kit in photo): [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/5n2cme.png[/img]
Queen Black Dragon: [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/35a62k1.png[/img]
So come play the server :) You wont regret it..
Webclient http://www.7roject.enjin.com/play/ Download 3mb http://www.mediafire.com/?9bzjfj29tj0qqy0/ Forums http://www.7roject.enjin.com/

item.title: 7roject - 718/728 BETA | Need players | Classes | Fun | Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Apwpk Apwpk
item.description:
@Apwpk wrote:

Yeah its sweet

Updates:
Added in prestige system, For king and divine it resets the combat stats, Lazy-Warrior All stats. Prestige perks are curently being added.

In-Game Bank look up, You can set your bank to Private/Public

Gambling is now King only.

Added Tier system, Iron - Steel - Mith - Adamant - Rune

Quest tab options/Loadstone Menu

34fb8z7.png759×499

Read full topic
item.source: 7roject - 718/728 BETA | Need players | Classes | Fun | Webclient

item.title: 7roject - 718/728 BETA | Need players | Classes | Fun | Webclient
item.dc:creator: @7roject 7roject
item.description:
@7roject wrote:

see that would make sense that everybody is using the High rate, but considering the harder the xp rate the more perks… it keeps it a nice balanced system.

item.title: 7roject - 718/728 BETA | Need players | Classes | Fun | Webclient
item.dc:creator: @vyre-scape vyre-scape
item.description:
@vyre-scape wrote:

Your content has been released in R-S snippet and tutorial section. Nothing original except the classes, which are pretty cool but in the same time useless due to everyone will choose the highest rate.

OT: Good luck on your server.

Read full topic
